com.btmatthews.atlas.core.dao.mongo

Class MongoDAO<I,T extends I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.atlas.core.dao.mongo.MongoDAO<I,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The interface class.
    T - The concrete class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<I>

    public abstract class MongoDAO<I,T extends I>
extends Object
implements DAO<I>
    Abstract base class that implements common features of data access objects that use MongoDB for persistence.
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected MongoDAO(Class<T> clazz)
      Initialise the Mongo data access object setting concrete class to clazz.

      Retrieve a subset of the matching objects of the specified type from the data store.
      protected List<I> find(org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query query, Paging paging)
      Execute a query that should return zero or more objects.
      protected I findOne(org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query query)
      Execute a query that should a return single object from the data store.
      protected I read(org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.query.Query query)
      Retrieve an object from the database that matches the specified query.
      I read(String id)
      Retrieve a persisted object using its identified.

      Used by the Spring Framework to inject factory used to construct the Mongo Template.

      Update an existing object in the data store.
